title: Video Editor
job_overview:
Company: Catch America
Work Hours: 6:00 AM – 2:00 PM PDT (8 hours/day, 40 hours/week)
Rate: $6–$7/hour (based on experience)

What You’ll Do:
Edit long-form and short-form video content for YouTube, social media, and campaigns.
Add transitions, music, captions, sound effects, and motion graphics.
Organize raw footage, edit cuts, and deliver polished final products.
Follow brand guidelines and creative briefs.
Stay updated with video trends and platform best practices.
Collaborate with content creators and marketing team.


Requirements:
Proven experience as a video editor with a strong portfolio.
Proficiency in editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, CapCut, DaVinci Resolve, etc.).
Knowledge of social media formats and aspect ratios (TikTok, Instagram Reels, YouTube Shorts, etc.).
Strong sense of storytelling, pacing, and visual style.
Reliable internet connection and ability to work remotely.
Able to work full-time from 6:00 AM to 2:00 PM PDT.

How to Apply:
Please attach the following:
Your updated resume.
A portfolio showcasing your previous social media work.

Applicants without a resume and portfolio will not be entertained. Thank you!

Deadline of Application: July 31, 2025
